Bhawana is your gateway to the largest digital repository of Sinhala novels and short stories in Sri Lanka. Whether you're an avid reader or just getting started, Bhawana is your one-stop destination for all things Sinhala literature. Featuring works by Sujeewa Prasanna Arachchi, Sri Lanka's most celebrated author, Bhawana brings you a diverse selection of novels and short stories that capture the essence of Sri Lankan culture, emotion, and life.

Why Choose Bhawana?
Extensive Library: Explore the biggest collection of digital Sinhala novels and short stories, all conveniently available in one place. With Bhawana, you have access to countless stories and novels from Sujeewa Prasanna Arachchi, who is known for his captivating narratives and deep understanding of human emotions. Whether you're looking for romance, drama, mystery, or adventure, Bhawana has something for every reader.

Real-Time Notifications: Never miss out on a new release! Bhawana keeps you updated with instant notifications whenever new stories are added to the platform. Stay in the loop with the latest works from your favourite authors and be the first to read new chapters as soon as they're available.

User-Friendly Features: Bhawana is designed to enhance your reading experience with user-friendly features. Quickly find the stories you love using the search and filter options, bookmark your favourites for easy access, and leave feedback on the stories you’ve read. Share your thoughts and help other readers discover great content!

Seamless Experience Across Devices: Bhawana offers a seamless experience across iOS devices, ensuring a consistent reading experience on the platform. Download the app from the App Store and start reading as soon as it's installed. The user-friendly interface makes navigation through the extensive library easy, ensuring an enjoyable reading journey.

A Community of Readers: Join a growing community of passionate readers who love Sinhala literature as much as you do. Share your thoughts on stories, recommend books to friends, and connect with other readers who share your interests. With Bhawana, you're not just reading a story, you're becoming part of a vibrant literary community.

We Value Your Feedback: We value your input! Bhawana is constantly evolving, and your feedback helps us improve the app and expand our library. Whether you have suggestions for new features, comments on the stories, or just want to share your experience, we’d love to hear from you and make Bhawana even better!

Start Your Reading Adventure Today!

Bhawana is more than just an app, it's a portal to the world of Sinhala stories, bringing you closer to the heart of Sri Lankan culture through literature. With easy access to the works of Sujeewa Prasanna Arachchi, you'll find yourself immersed in stories that inspire, entertain, and move you. Download Bhawana today from the App Store and start your journey into the world of Sinhala literature. 

Happy reading!

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

- Discover Now Playing / Popular / Top / Trending / Upcoming / Best Of Years Movies & TV Shows
- Quick search for movies and TV series by title
- Watch trailers and other videos
- Create your own watchlists for movies
- TV series calendar
- Detailed information about movies and TV series
- Rate Movies/TV shows in app and explore other rating
- Complete list of episodes for TV series with complete information about the episodes

app_name: SL Geek - Sri Lanka’s Tech App
description:
Welcome to the only official SL Geek app, created by the largest tech YouTube channel in Sri Lanka with a community of more than one million followers (and still growing). Since 2016 SL Geek has delivered nearly a decade of expert tech knowledge in Sinhala, helping Sri Lankans stay ahead in the digital world.

With this app you can:
	•	Read tech news in Sinhala the moment it breaks – no more waiting for subtitles or translations. 
	•	Catch exclusive content from the SL Geek team you will not find anywhere else.
	•	Enjoy a clutter-free reading experience designed for quick scrolling on any screen size.
	•	Receive optional push alerts so big stories never slip past you.
	•	Watch select SL Geek videos right inside the app for a seamless switch between reading and viewing.
	•	See continuous improvements – we roll out updates all the time, adding fresh features and polishing performance based on your feedback.

Tech can feel complex, but learning about it should be simple. Download the SL Geek app today and get every new breakthrough, device launch, and security tip in clear Sinhala, straight from the trusted voice you have followed for years.

Feel free to contact us if you have any concerns regarding the app.
Email : pasindu@slgeek.lk
Web : https://www.slgeek.lk

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

Do you want to get Princess ready for her wedding? Would you like to improve your bride-dressing skills?
The Makeup Dress-Up game is one of a kind. You can play with the huge collection of dresses and apply makeup to make your favorite fashion icon look beautiful. One of the latest wedding games for girls allows you to channel your inner fashion designer. You get to prepare your bride for the red carpet at the royal wedding. You get to play with conventional makeup as a fashion stylist.

THE GAME STORY
You play a fashion designer or make-up artist who is tasked with getting the girls ready for every occasion. In this interesting beauty game, you may learn how to apply girl makeup, wear shoes, wear hairstyles, and design jewelry. You'll enjoy taking part in fashion competitions as well.

THE GAME FEATURES
* Play with the latest new wedding outfits for the bridal style.
* Play a traditional bridal game with your friends.
* Play the Indian Fashion Girl make-up game and give yourself a makeover with Royal Wedding hairstyles, eyes, lips, cheeks, and so on.
* Unlock new items in this fashion story by collecting diamonds.
* Participate in a dressing up and makeover competition and become the competition's best stylist.

Relax and dive into a great story! Enjoy our bestselling series! Millions of readers can’t get enough of our library of unputdownable novels. Dive into an extensive collection of audiobooks, ebook novels, and immersive fiction stories. New chapters and interactive stories are added every day.

BINGE-READ / SNACK-READ
* Unstoppable addictive stories span multiple seasons, and new chapters released daily!
* 15 minutes per chapter, read at your own pace, whenever wherever you are, any time you want.

A LIBRARY FOR EVERY DESIRE
* Fall in love with our epic novels and unlimited fiction series.
* 400 ebooks to choose from, featuring chat fiction and other immersive elements
* Exclusive online novels from best-selling authors
* Follow your favorite books and writers as we craft a never-ending story.

A REVOLUTIONARY READING EXPERIENCE
* More immersive, interactive, and engaging than a traditional book.
* Turn on/off music, ambiance, and sound effects.
* Watch your favorite characters' conversation unfold in text messages too!
* Offline reading anytime, anywhere.

STORIES IN BOTH BOOK/AUDIOBOOK FORMATS

LANGUAGES

The CNN app is your destination for unrivaled, fact-based reporting. Stay informed at every turn as the story breaks through short-form videos, interactives, articles, podcasts, live audio and more. Easily discover the day's top news from politics, health, world news, climate and beyond.

Download the CNN app to start making sense of the world today.

START STREAMING THE CNN EXPERIENCE TODAY.
Now watch unlimited streaming, including 24/7 global news, daily programs from trusted journalists, award-winning shows and films, and more.

FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES.
Set custom alerts and notifications so you can follow developing stories. Our "live update" articles evolve as the news comes in, giving you accurate updates as they happen.

WATCH THE STORY UNFOLD.
See it for yourself with CNN’s live video or be in the know quickly with CNN Shorts.

STAY SHARP WITH EXPERT INSIGHTS.
Delivering in-depth analysis and context that matters from award-winning journalists, so you're prepared for what's next.

DIVE DEEPER WITH LIVE REPORTING.
Enjoy a 5-minute preview of CNN live. Unlock unlimited viewing, including CNN's original series and documentary collection, CNN, CNN International, and HLN by logging into your TV provider. Stay caught up with video clips, no login necessary.

TAKE A BREAK.
From travel and style news to the latest in entertainment, discover feel-good stories and get a daily dose of positivity.

LISTEN TO STAY CONNECTED.
Listen to top headlines anywhere you go with live audio from CNN, CNN en Español, CNN International and HLN. Hear the week's biggest and most talked-about stories with the "1 Thing" podcast.
 
DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTION (Available in the United States)

• Live coverage
• Exclusive videos
• Original series
• Award-winning films
• Unlimited articles

Basic plan - The basic CNN experience
• Unlimited articles

Listening is more ENJOYABLE and PRODUCTIVE than reading.
Text To Speech: Audio Books is an AI technology that enables to convert and read aloud any text as speech imitative of the human voice. This app transforms text, books, document, PDF and online articles into audiobooks. Now you can stay informed while cooking, driving, work out, doing sports, commute and let Text To Speech work as a text reader for you.

Text To Speech - Audiobooks is an essential tool for all kinds of reader, especially for those who are busy and want to enjoy audiobooks or people with dyslexia and other reading difficulties. The app is like an audible book, it can read aloud any text, webpages, PDF, eBooks or text book to you with our high quality natural sounding voices.

FEATURE LIST:
• Listen to articles, PDF, digital text, or physical books AS AUDIO.
• Listen with 50+ high quality natural human voices and 20+ languages.
• Listen at any speed you like, even faster or slower 5x than usual speed.
• Scan physical book pages with your device camera and convert to audible text.
• Import internet articles and online news straight from your mobile browser.
• Upload and convert photo, PDF and Docs file from iCloud, Google Drive, Dropbox.
• Listen to audible text with your iOS iPhone and iPad
• Organize listening files with library
• Support multiple languages: English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Japanese, Italian, Russian, Dutch, Finnish, Swedish, Danish, Turkish, Polish, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Arabic, Hindi, Korean, Thai.


I. LISTEN TO ANY TEXT - IN ANYWHERE - AT ANYTIME:
Import PDF, photo of physical book pages, document, online articles, web pages or insert clipboard-copied text and let Text To Speech read aloud text to you in the natural human voice. Don't read anymore! Let's listen to your text!

II. +50 VOICES FOR BOTH MAN AND WOMEN, SUPPORTED 20 LANGUAGES:
Text To Speech provides more 50 high quality human voice across 20 languages. Just pick your favourite voice and find the perfect reading speed that works for you.

III. READ FASTER, REMEMBER LONGER
Text To Speech helps highlight each word as it reads. Listening and reading at the same time can maximize the levels of comprehension and help the reader remember longer than usual.

IV. SOLUTION FOR USERS WITH READING DYSLEXIA:
Text To Speech is a perfect solution for users with Dyslexia, ADHD, Low vision acuity, anxiety, concussions, and other reading disabilities to breeze through their readings and engage with their curiosities.


With Text To Speech : Audio Books, you can save time, retain more information, and stay focused. No matter what kind of reader you are, experience more with Text To Speech - Natural Reader.

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTIONS:

• Subscribed user can get access to Text To Speech Premium natural reading voices with unlimited uses.

• User can subscribe for one month (USD 19.99$) and one year (USD 99.99$) auto-renewing subscription.

• Unsubscribed users can only use those services with a limited quota per day.

• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase

• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period

• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal

• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase

• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.


Terms of Use: http://vulcanlabs.co/terms-of-use/

Privacy Policy: http://vulcanlabs.co/privacy-policy/

You are welcome to contact us at support@vulcanlabs.co

app_name: Meb : หนังสือดี นิยายดัง
description:
meb - mobile e-books: An organic e-bookstore system (born from brains and two hands furiously pounding the keyboard!), designed for true book lovers. Distilled from the heart and brewed with all our skill.

Discover books—novels, comics, pocketbooks, magazines—from a wide array of writers and publishers flocking to join us.
Comes with generous, no-strings-attached samples for you to try.
Buy once and read across your devices—iPad, iPhone, Mac, and other platforms.

- An easy-to-use bookstore system: Organized into categories, search with various filters, and a huge variety of books.

La Harvard Business School è la più importante Business School al mondo. La Harvard Business Review nasce come costola di Harvard Business School ed oggi  si posiziona come RIVISTA GLOBALE, leader del segmento di business e management con oltre 500.000 copie vendute mensilmente nel mondo, di cui 15.000 distribuite in Italia.

Harvard Business Review Italia pubblica in contemporanea gli articoli tradotti della versione originale, ma è arricchita da rubriche di esperti italiani. Inoltre, contiene dei commenti a tutti gli articoli originali da parte dei più autorevoli business leader italiani (ad esempio, hanno scritto per HBR Italia: Corrado Passera, Sergio Marchionne, Ermenegildo Zegna, Carlo Pesenti, Paolo Scaroni e tanti altri). Le caratteristiche che fanno di questa rivista il punto di riferimento internazionale e nazionale sono la qualità, l’attualità e la capacità dei contenuti presentati di fornire non solo indicazioni strategiche, ma anche soluzioni pratiche e operative per la gestione aziendale.

HBR Italia rappresenta uno strumento di aggiornamento per manager, imprenditori e studenti universitari unico ed indispensabile, oggi ancora più moderno grazie alla nuova impostazione grafica ed editoriale della rivista ed  alla possibilità di consultarla anche sul lettore digitale leader di mercato.

Non è possibile effettuare una cancellazione dell'abbonamento in corso.
